snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown signed legislation that guarantees transgender students access to interscholastic sports, gym classes, locker rooms and bathrooms based on their gender identity.
abstract: California Gov Jerry Browns signs into law bill that guarantees transgender students access to interscholastic sports, gym classes, locker rooms and bathrooms based on their gender identity.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown signed legislation that guarantees transgender students access to interscholastic sports, gym classes, locker rooms and bathrooms based on their gender identity.

headline.main: California: Rights Guaranteed for Transgender Students
headline.print_headline: California: Rights Guaranteed For Transgender Students
